title: Secure Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
summary: Implement a secure login mechanism with multi-factor authentication for portal access.
description: This epic focuses on establishing a robust authentication framework for the self-service banking portal. It will include user registration, credential validation, password encryption, and multi-factor authentication (MFA) using methods such as OTP or biometric verification. The implementation will ensure compliance with financial security standards while protecting user data and preventing unauthorized access to sensitive information.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
summary: Design and develop a responsive, user-friendly, and accessible interface for all devices.
description: This epic involves creating a consistent and intuitive user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The interface will prioritize usability, accessibility, and clean design to ensure easy navigation and task completion in minimal clicks. It will also include responsive layouts and a design system that aligns with brand guidelines while catering to accessibility standards for all types of users.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Eligibility-Based Services
summary: Build a personalized dashboard displaying customer-specific products and eligibility-based services.
description: This epic will deliver a customized dashboard that presents relevant banking products and services based on the customer’s profile, eligibility, and transaction behavior. The dashboard will serve as the central entry point for users to view summaries of their accounts, track services, and access quick actions. Data will be securely fetched in real-time to reflect the user's banking status and personalized offers.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable digital workflows for new account requests and service modifications.
description: This epic introduces guided workflows that allow customers to open new accounts or modify existing services seamlessly through the online portal. Each workflow will be designed for minimal user effort, providing validation at each step, and offering contextual help where necessary. The system will connect with backend services for approval routing and maintain transparency in process completion.

title: Save and Resume Applications
summary: Implement functionality allowing users to save incomplete applications and resume later.
description: This epic enables customers to temporarily save applications or requests they have not completed and return to finish them at a later time. Data will be securely stored in a draft state, with versioning support and session-tracking mechanisms. This feature increases convenience and reduces friction for users who may need additional time to gather required information before submission.

title: Document Upload and Management System
summary: Allow customers to securely upload and manage required documentation through the portal.
description: This epic will provide customers with the capability to upload necessary documents for account openings or service requests. The system will validate file formats, handle secure transmission, and manage encrypted storage in compliance with financial data regulations. Users will also be able to view the status of uploaded files and receive feedback if additional documents are needed.

title: Request Tracking and Notification Framework
summary: Provide real-time status tracking and automated notifications for user submissions.
description: This epic establishes a tracking system that enables customers to monitor the live status of their requests and receive automated alerts. Notifications via email or within the portal will inform users about major status updates such as submission, approval, or rejection. The functionality ensures continuous transparency, reducing the need for customers to contact support for updates.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Logs
summary: Maintain a detailed record of all customer interactions and service activities.
description: This epic captures and stores all portal interactions, transactions, and modification histories to provide a clear overview of customer activity. It will include timestamped audit logs for every significant user action for both customer access and internal administrative purposes. This ensures traceability, compliance with regulatory standards, and enhanced accountability for all processed actions.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems for seamless transactions.
description: This epic focuses on creating secure and scalable integrations between the new self-service portal and the bank’s existing core banking infrastructure. It involves data synchronization via secure APIs and real-time communication channels for account details, service statuses, and updates. The integration will ensure data consistency, support automated backend workflows, and maintain high reliability for mission-critical operations.

title: Independent Data Storage and Performance Optimization
summary: Design an independent database for portal data with performance optimization features.
description: This epic covers the creation of an optimized, standalone database to handle user activity, documents, and requests while syncing with the bank’s core system. It will include caching, indexing, and performance tuning to provide fast data retrieval and resilience under high traffic. The infrastructure will ensure data integrity, fault tolerance, and reduced dependency on the core banking database for portal performance.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization
summary: Implement role-based access control ensuring users access only authorized services.
description: This epic introduces a comprehensive role-based access control (RBAC) model that assigns specific permissions to users based on their role, profile type, and authorization level. It will ensure customers, administrators, and service associates can only access functionalities aligned with their responsibilities. The RBAC module strengthens compliance, segmentation, and internal control policies essential for secure banking operations.
